thread.section_title: The Milestone Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic
thread.title_full: Fantastic - Review of The Milestone Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ktgraham2017
title: Fantastic
text:
What an amazing experience, the staff were great, couldn't do enough for us, the room we stayed in was gorgeous. Everyone was friendly and welcoming, they even left a present for our son in the room. Strongly recommend people to stay there, we will definitely be back, thank you!
Room Tip: we stayed in the Margaret Rose room which was lovely and quiet over looking Kensington Gardens See more room tips
